body: Art is good, story's for cucks

@WakapoldaWakanda

"This... Has turned into a difficult situation"

I really want to ask for translations because, i wanna kill myself (they said "ask for translations and you will die"). But on the other hand, i don't want to die before i read translated version of this good piece of art.

Chicks who are responsible enough to raise a family, manage their job while pleasing their beloved and fitting everything into their schedule while not having any sexual relationships with any man other than her husband sure are my weakness.
